E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1989
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Mike Easler



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Ryan Klesko
Dear Sir,
Ryan Klesko has an AVG of .310 at A Lakeland Tigers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Kazuyoshi Tatsunami
Dear Sir,
Kazuyoshi Tatsunami has nothing more to prove at A Lakeland Tigers!
He has an AVG of .436 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
